title: 1800+ AI Tools with Prices & Voting System - Flask Backend
content: Flask, a popular Python web framework, is being used to power a backend system for an AI tool marketplace. The article showcases a Flask application that provides a platform for users to browse and vote on over 1800 AI tools, categorized into different categories such as Generative-Art AI Tools. The author highlights the use of Flask's simplicity and flexibility in building the backend, allowing for easy integration with other Python libraries and frameworks commonly used in AI development. The article also mentions the implementation of a pricing system for the AI tools, enabling developers to monetize their creations. Overall, this article serves as a great example of how Flask can be leveraged to create powerful and scalable backend systems for AI tool marketplaces.
